description: A deliciously creamy gnocchi dish with the earthiness of mushroom.
name: Gnocchi with Mushrooms & Blue Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g mixed mushrooms, washed, drained and sliced
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat with the oil and fry the mushrooms, onion and garlic for 5 minutes.
Add the gnocchi and fry for 1 minute. Add the vegetable stock to the pan and bring to the boil.
Allow to simmer for 5 minutes and add the cream. Contine to cook for a further 5 minutes.
Once the sauce has reduced, serve with the crumbled blue cheese on top and garnish with parsley.
